name: Sourdough
description: A tangy, crusty bread made from a fermented dough.

name: Baguette
description: A long, narrow loaf known for its crispy crust.

name: Focaccia
description: A flat oven-baked Italian bread, often seasoned with herbs.

description: An Italian white bread with a crispy crust and soft, airy interior.

name: Whole Wheat Bread
description: A healthy bread made from whole grain flour.
